text.p: Which of these is the definition of linearly dependent?
A list of vectors [mathjaxinline]\{ v_1; v_2; \ldots v_ n\}[/mathjaxinline] is linearly dependent if...

choice.text: ...there exist scalars [mathjaxinline]a_1, a_2, \ldots a_ n[/mathjaxinline], not all zero, such that [mathjaxinline]a_1v_1 + a_2v_2 + \ldots a_ nv_ n = \mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline].
...there exist scalars [mathjaxinline]a_1, a_2, \ldots a_ n[/mathjaxinline], all not zero, such that [mathjaxinline]a_1v_1 + a_2v_2 + \ldots a_ nv_ n = \mathbf{0}[/mathjaxinline].
Both of these are the definition.
